text: which make target were you using?
(BTW - what's your host operating system?   With the current master branch, you should be able to build/run everything without Vagrant by simply using Docker)
I’m using Mac OSX
target was dist-clean all

I'm pretty sure that many of the bdd tests still fail (it's a problem which will be addressed when most people get back from the holiday)

I use Mac OSX myself.  I basically just installed Docker for Mac and then just run everything locally on my Mac (i.e. I don't use Vagrant)

`make unit-tests` works fine for me with the latest master
`make peer-docker` and `make orderer-docker` also work for me as well
